prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgeContent:
> ![](media/image1.png)I\'m Pavol, a developer who is passionate about
> using new tools and technologies.
>
> I specialise in creating fully functional user applications using the
> latest artificial intelligence models.
>
> I am a member of the [Ainautes](https://www.ainautes.com/) consulting
> group, which supports with the deployment of generative AI around
>
> the world.
>
> I develop the
> [WebGPT](https://webgpt.cz/?partner=ph&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=personal%E2%80%93page&utm_content=pavolhejny.com&utm_campaign=partner%E2%80%93ph)
> web page generation service.
>
> Before the massive emergence of generative AI, I have created the
> first Czech virtual whiteboard, [Collboard](https://collboard.com/),
> and electronic textbooks, [H-edu](https://h-edu.cz/), which were used
> by tens of thousands of children.
>
> I have also worked on many scientific projects for the [Czech
> Ornithological Society](https://www.birdlife.cz/en/).
>
> I regularly give lectures at conferences, sit on juries, and act as a
> mentor in many Czech and international competitions.
>
> I have a special heart for this, and I love **open source** -- you can
> find many of my things on my GitHub.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgeContent}

promptResult.content:
Pavol is a developer with a keen interest in utilizing new tools and technologies, specializing in creating user applications using the latest artificial intelligence models. He is a member of the Ainautes consulting group, which focuses on the global deployment of generative AI technologies.

---

He developed the WebGPT web page generation service. Prior to the widespread adoption of generative AI, Pavol created the first Czech virtual whiteboard, Collboard, and electronic textbooks called H-edu, which were used by tens of thousands of children.

---

Pavol has contributed to numerous scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society. He is also active in the educational and competitive sectors, providing lectures at conferences, participating as a jury member, and mentoring in various Czech and international competitions.

---

He has a strong affinity for open source projects, and many of his contributions can be found on his GitHub profile.

messages.content:
You are experienced data researcher, extract the important knowledge from the document.

# Rules

-   Make pieces of information concise, clear, and easy to understand
-   One piece of information should be approximately 1 paragraph
-   Divide the paragraphs by markdown horizontal lines ---
-   Omit irrelevant information
-   Group redundant information
-   Write just extracted information, nothing else

# The document

Take information from this document:

> > ![](media/image1.png)I\'m Pavol, a developer who is passionate about
> > using new tools and technologies.
> >
> > I specialise in creating fully functional user applications using the
> > latest artificial intelligence models.
> >
> > I am a member of the [Ainautes](https://www.ainautes.com/) consulting
> > group, which supports with the deployment of generative AI around
> >
> > the world.
> >
> > I develop the
> > [WebGPT](https://webgpt.cz/?partner=ph&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=personal%E2%80%93page&utm_content=pavolhejny.com&utm_campaign=partner%E2%80%93ph)
> > web page generation service.
> >
> > Before the massive emergence of generative AI, I have created the
> > first Czech virtual whiteboard, [Collboard](https://collboard.com/),
> > and electronic textbooks, [H-edu](https://h-edu.cz/), which were used
> > by tens of thousands of children.
> >

> > Ornithological Society](https://www.birdlife.cz/en/).
> >

> > mentor in many Czech and international competitions.
> >

> > find many of my things on my GitHub.
>

message.content:
Pavol is a developer with a keen interest in utilizing new tools and technologies, specializing in creating user applications using the latest artificial intelligence models. He is a member of the Ainautes consulting group, which focuses on the global deployment of generative AI technologies.

---

He developed the WebGPT web page generation service. Prior to the widespread adoption of generative AI, Pavol created the first Czech virtual whiteboard, Collboard, and electronic textbooks called H-edu, which were used by tens of thousands of children.

---

Pavol has contributed to numerous scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society. He is also active in the educational and competitive sectors, providing lectures at conferences, participating as a jury member, and mentoring in various Czech and international competitions.

---

He has a strong affinity for open source projects, and many of his contributions can be found on his GitHub profile.
